name: Word Create - Search & Connect
description:
Test your vocabulary skills with the ultimate word finding game! Swipe and connect the pool of jumbled letters to find the hidden words!

- Simple, easy and addictive gameplay
- Swipe your finger over the letters to build words - anything from 2 letter to 7 letter words
- The game starts easy but gets progressively harder
- More than 600 brain busting levels!
- No time limits, play at your leisure
- Family friendly - fun for girls and boys

Download now for free!
